Definition: The no of connections between one node and the rest of the network
The no of connections between the neighbours of a node
Equation: 2t/(k(k−1));k is the node degree; t is the fraction of triangles around a node.

Definition: Inverse of path length (minimum no of edges to traverse from one node to another)
Equation: 1N(N−1)Σ(1dij)Where dij is the shortest path length between nodes i and j

Definition: Areas of highly interconnected nodes, with few connections to nodes in other modules
